question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/transaction-filter/src/boolean_transaction_filter.rs] [Function: new_from_proto()] [Stack overflow / DoS] Can an attacker craft a deeply nested BooleanTransactionFilter with thousands of recursive LogicalNot operations to cause stack overflow during deserialization, leading to indexer service crash and loss of availability?
